it.polimi.se2018.controller

Interface ToolCardBehaviour

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlterDieValueBehaviour, MoveDiceBehaviour, MoveSomeDiceBehaviour, PlaceDieBehaviour, PullAgainAndPlaceBehaviour, ReRollDieBehaviour, ReRollDraftPoolBehaviour, SwapDiceBehaviour

    public interface ToolCardBehaviour
    This interface represents the behavior of a tool card.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean areRequirementsSatisfied(Game game)
      Tells if the requirements to activate the tool card are met in the game.
      void askParameters(ViewMessage message)
      Selects the correct view to gather the parameters the tool card needs to be used.
      ToolCardBehaviourResponse useToolCard(Game game, ViewMessage message)
      Applies the effect of the tool card to the game.

    • Method Detail

      • areRequirementsSatisfied

        boolean areRequirementsSatisfied(Game game)
        Tells if the requirements to activate the tool card are met in the game.
        Parameters:
        game - The game the tool card will be applied to.
        Returns:
        true if all requirements are met; false otherwise.

      • askParameters

        void askParameters(ViewMessage message)
        Selects the correct view to gather the parameters the tool card needs to be used.
        Parameters:
        message - The message sent by the view.

      • useToolCard

        ToolCardBehaviourResponse useToolCard(Game game,
                                      ViewMessage message)
        Applies the effect of the tool card to the game.
        Parameters:
        game - the game the effect has to be applied to.
        message - the message sent by the view.
        Returns:
        true if the tool card has been successfully applied; false otherwise.
